arm_group.description: Slanted recession of the lateral rectus muscle for the intermittent exotropia with convergence weakness

brief_summary.textblock:
This study was conducted to evaluate results of slanted recession of the lateral rectus
      muscle for intermittent exotropia with convergence weakness

clinical_study.brief_title: Early Results of Slanted Recession of the Lateral Rectus Muscle for Intermittent Exotropia With Convergence Weakness

detailed_description.textblock:
This prospective study included 31 patients who underwent slanted lateral rectus muscle
      recession for intermittent exotropia with convergence weakness. Measurements of preoperative
      and postoperative deviation angle, stereopsis was performed.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:

          -  Patients with intermittent exotropia greater at near than at distance by 10 prism
             diopters or more

          -  Patients with follow up duration greater than 6 months

        Exclusion Criteria:

          -  Patients with previous ocular or strabismus surgery

          -  Patients with ocular or neurologic pathologic conditions

          -  Follow up duration less than 6 months

intervention.description: All patients who had intermittent exotropia with convergence weakness was enrolled to the slanted lateral rectus muscle recession group.
intervention.intervention_name: Slanted recession of the lateral rectus muscle

clinical_study.official_title: Early Results of Slanted Recession of the Lateral Rectus Muscle for Intermittent Exotropia With Convergence Weakness; A Prospective Study

primary_outcome.description: Measurement of deviation angle after slanted recession surgery was performed.
primary_outcome.measure: Changes from baseline of exodeviations angle after slanted recession surgery at 6 months.

required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on June 04, 2014
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

responsible_party.investigator_title: Department of Ophthalmology, School of medicine, Kyungpook National University

secondary_outcome.description: Measurement of stereopsis after slanted recession was performed.
secondary_outcome.measure: Changes from baseline of near-distance difference after slanted recession surgery at 6 months

clinical_study.study_design: Intervention Model: Single Group Assignment, Masking: Open Label, Primary Purpose: Treatment
